name: Container
info: A container component used to hold a single child component. It integrates several functionalities of single child components, such as padding, margin, transformation, decoration, constraints, etc...

nodes.name: Can be used to display an area with specified width and height
Can place a child component within the area
Can align and position the child component
Can decorate the child component
desc: Can decorate: borders, rounded corners, colors, gradients, shadows, images, etc.

nodes.name: Container also has transformation capabilities
desc: Matrix transformation based on Matrix4, see linear algebra for details

nodes.name: Constraints of the Container
desc: Will constrain the size of the area, it will not be smaller than the specified minimum width and height, nor larger than the specified maximum width and height.
